fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Backstabber: Whenever you open a channel with someone, you may choose to deal 2 HP of unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase when you open the channel.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Misinformation: Send a host message of your choice to the action log. Nothing will actually happen with the message. [4 uses, 1 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Confuse: Pick a player. All non-true investigations (including cards) that target them this phase will give wrong information. [1 use, Unique]
